result.purpose: Responsible for handling push notifications, including defining models and producing messages to a Kafka topic.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, separating concerns between data models and message production.

internal/infras/pushnotification/models..purpose: Defines models for push notification requests and their components.

internal/infras/pushnotification/produce.purpose: This file implements a Kafka producer for publishing push notifications.
